title: Tribunal Updates?
body:
Hi everyone,

I haven't been able to find any new information on Tribunal coming back to OCE....

Has anyone heard anything about it or have any news?

replies.body: The 'Thank you for your report, it has been sent to The Tribunal for review' thingo should probably be removed considering the non-existent tribunal

> [{quoted}](name=NastyTech,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YdrFgwhK,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-01T05:55:29.895+0000)
>
> The 'Thank you for your report, it has been sent to The Tribunal for review' thingo should probably be removed considering the non-existent tribunal

it's still sent to riot at least.
Face it; it's never coming back.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YdrFgwhK,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-21T01:59:24.460+0000)
>
> Face it; it's never coming back.

it was never on oce to begin with.
Oh yeah that, but it *was once* on NA.
Pretty sure there hasn't been much/anything since it was announced. Good luck finding info on it.
